title: Order Additional IP addresses
ip_version_description: In many cases, you may need either a standard IPv4 or the latest IPv6 protocol. Please note that the list of compatible products may vary.
ipv4_card_description: Internet standard (from today). It is the most widely used addressing protocol on the Internet, and thus the most commonly supported.
ipv6_card_description: IPv6 is the most suitable option when large IP blocks are required and a hierarchical addressing scheme is in place. Make sure all your customers have access to the new protocol as well as your services
service_selection_title: Select the service for which you want to order Additional IPs
region_selection_title: Select a region for your new Additional IP
additional_ip_block_card_description: IPv4 address block. The available block sizes will vary depending on the associated service.
geolocation_selection_description: Please choose one of the available locations for your new additional IPv4 address block.
geolocation_disabled_selection_descripti: Geolocation information cannot be changed for only one IP address.
organisation_selection_description: The organisation represents the administrative entity that owns the IP address block, and must be listed in the public WHOIS database (global registry of IP addresses and domain names). It includes the following contact details: name, RIR type and email address.
organisation_selection_description_no_or: Important: if you don’t link an organisation, your OVHcloud account details (NIC handle) will be made public in the ARIN WHOIS database for this IP block.
Important: if you don’t link an organisation, your company details shared with OVHcloud will be made public in the RIPE WHOIS database for this IP block.
organisation_selection_info: The organisation name linked to your IP address block will appear in the public WHOIS database, along with the corresponding contact information.
go_to_organisation_list_link_label: Click here to access organisation management.
service_selection_ip_quota_exceeded_erro: You have reached the maximum quota of IPs for this server.
additional_options_selection_description: In many cases, you may need either a standard IPv4 (the most commonly used) or the latest IPv6 protocol. Please note that the list of compatible products may vary.
new_prefix_ipv6_card_description: Get your new IPv6 prefix to use in vRack services.
ipv6_limit_reached_error: You have reached the maximum limit of additional IPv6 blocks
ipv6_region_3_blocks_limit_reached_error: You have reached the maximum limit of 3 additional IPv6 blocks in the selected region. Please select another region
ipv6_region_already_used_error: You already have a block from the region selected in your vRack. Please select another region
vrack_bandwidth_section_description: When assigning an additional IP to a private vRack network, public bandwidth must be enabled.
ap_bandwidth_limit_tooltip_info: Bandwidth availability may be limited in the Asia-Pacific regions.
ip_order_success_message: Your additional IP order has started in a new tab. Please complete it to finalise your purchase. If the new tab does not open, <Link>click here.</Link>
upgrade_bandwidth_order_success_message: Your bandwidth order has started in a new tab. Please complete it to finalise your purchase. If the new tab does not open, <Link>click here.</Link>
bandwidth_option_card_tooltip: A pro-rata charge applies for the remaining days of your current billing cycle, and full pricing begins in the next billing cycle.
vrack_bandwidth_double_order_info_messag: An order for public bandwidth and an order for the additional IP are required if you already have public bandwidth enabled on your vRack. If you do not yet have public bandwidth enabled, only one order is necessary.
upgrade_bandwidth_order_error_message: An error occurred while ordering the public bandwidth. Please try again later.
